mapper.select: select n.id as noticeLd, title, content, fileUrl, createAt from notice n join company c on n.company_id = c.id where c.name = #{company} and n.createAt>#{date}
select n.id, title, content, fileUrl, createAt from notice n join company c on n.company_id = c.id where c.name =#{company} order by c.id desc limit 10 offset #{offset}
select count(n.id) from notice n join company c on n.company_id = c.id where c.name = #{company}
